Class-Fighter 20 -- Male Half-Orc Fighter: 20
Strength: 19 (+4) Dexterity: 18 (+4) Constitution: 18 (+4) Intelligence: 18 (+4) Wisdom: 18 (+4) Charisma: 18 (+4)
Background: Acolyte Alignment: Neutral Good Deity: Shelyn (NG)
Experience: 19500/20000 Level: 20 Speed: 25 Size: Medium Encumbered/Maximum Bulk: 9/14
Ability Notes: Ability Boosts: Ability Boost (Choose 20 from any)
Features/Skills
Feat Count: Ancestry: 5; Class: 11; General: 5; Skill: 10 Selectable Feature Count: Fighter (Key Ability); Human (Heritage)

Feature Notes:
Ancestry Feats: 5 selections
Clever Improviser: Has the Untrained Improvisation feature
Fighter Expertise: Class Expert (Fighter)
Fighter Feats: 11 selections
Fighter Key Ability: 1 selection
General Feats: 5 selections
Half-Orc: Has the Low-Light Vision feature
Human Heritage: 1 selection
Orc Sight: Has the Darkvision feature
Skill Feats: 10 selections
Darkvision: Has normal b/w vision in darkness and dim light
Half-Orc: Has the orc trait and may take orc and half-orc feats
Low-Light Vision: Has normal vision in dim light
Perception: +30 (wisdom; master)
Skill Modifiers:
Acrobatics: +28 (dexterity; expert) Gnome Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Religion: +26 (wisdom; trained)
Arcana: +24 (intelligence; untrained) Halfling Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Scribing Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained)
Astral Plane Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Intimidation: +26 (charisma; trained) Society: +24 (intelligence; untrained)
Athletics: +30 (strength; master) Medicine: +24 (wisdom; untrained) Stealth: +24 (dexterity; untrained)
Crafting: +24 (intelligence; untrained) Midwifery Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Survival: +26 (wisdom; trained)
Deception: +26 (charisma; trained) Milling Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Taldan History Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained)
Demon Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Mining Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Tea Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained)

Untrained Improvisation: +20 on untrained skill checks
Assurance (Plains Lore): Can take an automatic 32 on Plains Lore checks
Assurance (Survival): Can take an automatic 32 on Survival checks
Clever Improviser: May attempt any skill untrained
Expeditious Search: Can Search at 2x normal Speed
Group Coercion: Can use Intimidation to Coerce 2 targets
Incredible Initiative: +2 on initiative rolls
Student Of The Canon: Critical failures on Religion checks to Decipher Writing or Recall Knowledge are normal failures/Failures to Recall Knowledge about own faith are successes, and successes are critical successes
Combat
Hit Points: 288 Armor Class: 40 (dexterity; master) Class DC: Fighter: 40 (strength; master)
Armor: None Shield: None
Combat Notes:
Armor Expertise: Defense Expert (Light Armor; Medium Armor; Heavy Armor; Unarmored Defense)
Armor Mastery: Defense Master (Light Armor; Medium Armor; Heavy Armor; Unarmored Defense)
Armor Proficiency: Defense Trained (Heavy Armor)
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +80
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +4
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +4
Greater Weapon Specialization: Has increased Weapon Specialization effects
Strength Attack Adjustment: +4
Versatile Legend: Attack Legendary (Simple Weapons; Martial Weapons; Unarmed Attacks)/Attack Master (Advanced Weapons)/Class Master (Fighter)
Weapon Legend: Attack Master (Simple Weapons; Martial Weapons; Unarmed Attacks)/Attack Expert (Advanced Weapons)
Advanced Weapon Training: Has proficiency with advanced weapons in chosen group equal to martial weapons
Advantageous Assault: (1) Strike on a grabbed, prone, or restrained foe inflicts additional damage equal to the number of damage dice, +2 HP if wielded two-handed, even on failure
Aggressive Block: (F) Shield Block moves foe 5' or inflicts flat-footed (foe's choice)
Agile Grace: Reduces multiple attack penalties with agile weapons to -3 and -6
Armor Expertise: Benefits from the specialization effects of medium and heavy armor
Assisting Shot: (1) Successful ranged Strike gives the next ally attack on the target within 1 rd +1 attack, or +2 with a critical success
Attack Of Opportunity: (R) Makes a melee Strike on a foe within reach that uses a manipulate or move action, makes a ranged Strike, or leaves a square while moving
Battlefield Surveyor: +2 Perception for initiative
Blind-Fight: Can attack concealed foes without a prior check and hidden creatures with a DC 5 flat check/Does not suffer flat-footed vs. hidden foes/Treats adjacent undetected creatures up to level 20 as hidden instead
Boundless Reprisals: Gives an additional Reaction to use a fighter feat or class feature once per foe turn
Brutal Finish: (1) Ends turn with a two-handed melee Strike that inflicts 2 additional damage dice, even on failure
Brutish Shove: (1) Two-handed melee Strike inflicts flat-footed until the end of turn; success also allows an automatic Shove
Certain Strike: (1) Melee Strike inflicts normal non-dice damage on failure
Combat Flexibility: Can select a fighter feat of up to 8th level to use each day
Combat Grab: (1) Successful melee Strike with the other hand free inflicts grabbed for 1 rd or until the target Escapes
Combat Reflexes: Gives an additional Reaction to make an Attack Of Opportunity once per turn
Debilitating Shot: (2) Successful ranged Strike also inflicts slowed 1 for 1 rd
Desperate Finisher: (R) Can use a press action after taking the last action in a turn, losing any further Reactions until next turn
Diehard: Remains alive until dying 5
Disarming Stance: (1) Stance gives +1 to Disarm and +2 vs. Disarm and allows Disarming foes two sizes larger when wielding a one-handed weapon with the other hand free
Disarming Twist: (1) Strike with a one-handed melee weapon and the other hand free inflicts Disarm on success; failure inflicts flat-footed until the end of turn
Disruptive Stance: (1) Stance allows using Attack Of Opportunity in response to a concentrate action; a successful Strike disrupts
Double Shot: (2) Makes two ranged Strikes against different foes at the current multiple attack penalty -2
Double Slice: (2) Makes simultaneous Strikes with two melee weapons at the current multiple attack penalty
Dual-Handed Assault: (1) Successful melee Strike with a 1-handed weapon and the other hand free inflicts additional damage, equal to its number of damage dice if it has the 2-handed trait or by one die step otherwise
Dueling Dance: (1) Stance gives continuous benefits of Dueling Parry
Dueling Parry: (1) Gives +2 Armor Class for 1 rd when wielding a one-handed melee weapon with the other hand free
Dueling Riposte: (R) While using Dueling Parry, makes a Strike or Disarm attempt on a foe who critically fails an attack on self
Exacting Strike: (1) Strike does not count toward multiple attack penalty on failure
Fearsome Brute: Strikes against frightened foes inflict additional damage equal to 2x the frightened value
Felling Strike: (2) Successful Strike vs. a flying foe causes it to fall 120', and a critical success grounds it for 1 rd
Fighter Weapon Mastery: Attack Master with simple weapons, martial weapons, and unarmed attacks of chosen group and Attack Expert with advanced weapons of the same group/Critical hits with a master proficiency weapon inflict its critical specialization effect
Flinging Shove: Aggressive Block moves foe 10' (critical success 20') or inflicts flat-footed, and Brutish Shove moves foe 10' (failure 5', critical success 20')
Furious Focus: A two-handed Power Attack counts as a single attack for multiple attack penalty
Graceful Poise: (1) Stance allows Double Slice with an agile weapon to count as one attack
Guardian's Deflection: (R) Gives an adjacent ally +2 Armor Class vs. the triggering hit when wielding a one-handed weapon with the other hand free
Guiding Finish: (1) A successful Strike moves a foe 10' to a spot within reach (failure moves the foe 5') when wielding a one-handed weapon with a hand free
Guiding Riposte: A successful Dueling Riposte Strike moves a foe 10' to a spot within reach
Impossible Volley: (3) Ranged Strike with a -2 penalty attacks all foes in a 10' radius
Improved Dueling Riposte: Gives an additional Reaction to make a Dueling Riposte once per turn
Improved Flexibility: Can select a fighter feat of up to 14th level to use each day
Improved Knockdown: Knockdown automatically inflicts a critical Trip, and using a two-handed weapon can cause the Trip to inflict damage based on the weapon damage die size
Improved Reflexive Shield: Using Shield Block on a Reflex save protects both self and adjacent allies
Improved Twin Riposte: Gives an additional Reaction to make a Twin Riposte once per turn
Incredible Aim: (2) Ranged Strike gains +2 attack and ignores concealment
Incredible Improvisation: (F) Gives +4 on an untrained skill check once per day
Incredible Ricochet: (1) Follows a ranged Strike with another against the same foe that ignores concealment and cover
Intimidating Strike: (2) Successful melee Strike inflicts frightened 1, or frightened 2 with a critical hit
Knockdown: (2) Follows a successful melee Strike with an Athletics check to Trip
Lunge: (1) Melee Strike has a +5' range
Lunging Stance: (1) Stance gives +5' reach on Attacks Of Opportunity
Mirror Shield: (R) Raised shield reflects a spell back upon the caster with a ranged Strike or spell attack
Mobile Shot Stance: (1) Stance negates Reactions from ranged Strikes and allows using Attack Of Opportunity with a loaded ranged weapon on an adjacent creature
Multishot Stance: (1) Stance reduces Double Shot and Triple Shot penalties to -1 and -2
Orc Ferocity: (R) Retains 1 Hit Point, increasing wounded condition by 1, when brought to 0 Hit Points once per day
Paragon's Guard: (1) Stance gives continuous benefits of Raise A Shield
Point-Blank Shot: (1) Stance negates volley penalty from a ranged volley weapon and gives +2 attack at close range with a ranged non-volley weapon
Positioning Assault: (2) Successful Strike with a 2-handed melee weapon moves a foe 5' to within reach
Power Attack: (2) Melee Strike inflicts 3 extra dice damage and counts as two Strikes for multiple attack penalty
Powerful Shove: Can use Aggressive Block and Brutish Shove on foes up to two sizes larger, inflicting 4 HP if a shoved creature hits a barrier
Quick Reversal: (1) Makes melee Strikes on two foes flanking self
Quick Shield Block: Can use an additional Reaction for a Shield Block once per turn
Reactive Shield: (R) Performs Raise A Shield to absorb damage from a melee Strike
Revealing Stab: (2) Leaves a piercing weapon embedded in a corporeal concealed or hidden foe to reveal it to others
Savage Critical: Successful attack rolls of 19 with a legendary weapon are critical successes
Shatter Defenses: (1) A successful melee Strike vs. a frightened foe inflicts flat-footed while the frightened condition lasts
Shield Block: (R) Raised shield negates damage equal to its hardness; self and shield each suffer any remaining damage
Shield Warden: Can use Shield Block to protect an adjacent ally
Shielded Stride: Can Stride at half Speed with shield raised without triggering Reactions
Snagging Strike: (1) Successful melee Strike with the other hand free inflicts flat-footed for 1 rd
Spring Attack: (1) Makes a melee Strike on a foe after Striding away from another
Stance Savant: (F) Enters a stance during initiative
Sudden Charge: (2) Makes a melee Strike after a double Stride
Sudden Leap: (2) Makes a melee Strike while Leaping, High Jumping, or Long Jumping up to 50'
Swipe: (2) Melee Strike attacks 2 adjacent foes
Triple Shot: Uses Double Shot against a single target, or uses three actions to make three ranged Strikes at the current multiple attack penalty -4
Twin Parry: (1) Parrying with one melee weapon in each hand gives +1 Armor Class for 1 rd, or +2 Armor Class if either weapon has the parry trait
Twin Riposte: (R) Twin Parry allows Striking or Disarming a foe who critically fails a Strike on self
Twinned Defense: (1) Stance gives continuous benefits of Twin Parry
Two-Weapon Flurry: (1) Strikes simultaneously with one weapon in each hand
Weapon Legend: Attack Legendary with simple weapons, martial weapons, and unarmed attacks of chosen group and Attack Master with advanced weapons of the same group
Weapon Specialization: Inflicts +4, +6, and +8 HP damage with expert, master, and legendary weapon proficiency
Weapon Supremacy: Permanently quickened; may use additional actions only to Strike
Whirlwind Strike: (3) Makes individual Strikes at the current multiple attack penalty against all foes within reach
Save: Fortitude: +30 (constitution; master); Reflex: +30 (dexterity; master); Will: +28 (wisdom; expert)
Save Notes:
Bravery: Save Expert (Will)
Evasion: Save Master (Reflex)
Juggernaut: Save Master (Fortitude)
Bravery: Successes on Will saves vs. fear are critical successes, and the severity of frightened conditions are reduced by 1
Determination: (1) Ends a nonpermanent spell (requires a successful counteract attempt) or a condition affecting self once per day
Evasion: Successes on Reflex saves are critical successes
Haughty Obstinacy: Successful saves vs. mental effects that control actions are critical successes, and foe Intimidation fails to Coerce are critical fails
Juggernaut: Successes on Fortitude saves are critical successes
Reflexive Shield: Raised shield adds shield bonus to Reflex saves
Notes
Validation Errors: Class Feats Allocation: 11 available vs. 74 allocated
